name: Introduction to Film Studies
description: This course will introduce students to the fundamentals of film studies. Topics include film history, theory, and criticism.

name: Film and Culture
description: This course will explore the ways in which films reflect, shape, and challenge cultural values. Students will learn to analyze films in terms of historical, social, and political contexts.

name: Film History I
description: This course will explore the history of the film industry from its beginnings to the present day. Topics include the development of film genres, technology, and aesthetics.

name: Film History II
description: This course will provide an in-depth exploration of the history of the film industry from its beginnings to the present day. Topics include the development of film genres, technology, and aesthetics.
